page.title: 09 Gosforth Park Hotel contd.
page.content: Chooses the food.The chef has 2 long shifts with a break between.He does this six times a week.There are 17 dishwashers,3 storemen,maids and 9 kitchen porters.Each restaurant in the hotel has different seasonal menus,each with a wide choice of dishes.When an order for food comes in it goes to the kitchen and is made on the spot.There are smaller,half portions for children. Vegetarian meals are specially made. There is a small menu for room service at night.The left overs are usually given to the pigs.Non residents can eat at the hotel usually on Fridays and Saturdays.There are more women than men employed by the hotel. Women do all aspects of catering from being a maid to office work.The hotel has many facilities including a swimming pool,2 squash courts,a jacuzzi sunbeds and a sauna.
